name: MCTest
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A dataset of 660 crowd-sourced fictional stories with 2,640 multiple-choice questions designed to evaluate machine comprehension.
notes: Each story is accompanied by four multiple-choice questions, each with four answer options. The dataset targets elementary-level text understanding and reasoning, with content suitable for readers aged 7. It was influential as a controlled reading comprehension test with broad research usage.
